title: 皐月賞の後に・次は絶対！

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Defeat...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whew, that was a tough one!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I gave it my all, but it just wasn't enough.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: As expected of the Classic Triple Crown route... the competition is full of fierce rivals, hmm...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, well, this is just the beginning! I may have missed the Triple Crown, but it's not over yet.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Racing up close against a strong opponent like Bourbon-san, I've kinda gotten a feel for her quirks.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So... it's okay! I still have a chance to win the 'Japanese Derby'!
And then, right at that moment—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, is that... Bourbon-san?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Due to not winning the 'Satsuki Sho'... achieving the Triple Crown is impossible. My and my father's one and only dream is—!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Oxygen supply is lower than usual. Cause unknown. Proceeding with deep breathing immediately.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: In... out... In... out...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ... ...Phew... Next is the 'Japanese Derby'.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Even if the result is defeat, I can't stop running.
Mihono Bourbon hurries away. Chasing after her... a small shadow comes running.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...—No, this isn't the time to worry.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san, and all the others, will definitely get even stronger next time!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: By the time of the 'Japanese Derby', Rice has to get even more, more, more...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...I have to do my best...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Rice-san, Bourbon-san... That was a determined look in your eyes.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Come to think of it, today's 'Satsuki Sho', Rice-san was kind of like this—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There was a unique kind of awesomeness...! Like, whoa~, yeah~... something like that!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The 'Japanese Derby' and 'Kikuka Sho' might come at you even harder.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's getting harder to let my guard down. Alright, I'll do my best~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, Trainer! Let's go eat ramen!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because I'm hungry!
After that, while slurping salt ramen at a random ramen shop we found—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Excuse me! Extra noodles, please!
We renewed our fighting spirit for the upcoming 'Japanese Derby'!
